description: A little bit of steam is the key to perfectly cooked fried eggs every time.
keywords: Egg dishes,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Perfect Fried Eggs Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the butter in a large non-stick pan on medium heat and swirl to coat the base well.
Reduce the heat to medium low. Crack the eggs into the pan and add 2 teaspoons of water. Cover the pan and cook for 1-1.5 minutes.
Immediately remove the eggs from the pan and serve with salt and pepper.
